task.title: Configure Your Presence Settings
task.shortdesc: You can log in the Extension User Portal to configure the call forwarding settings and ring strategy for your presence status.

step.cmd: Go to Me Presence , select the Presence that you want to configure.
In the Presence Information field, enter your information for the presence status.
step.info: The information will be displayed on Linkus client.

step.cmd: Configure the Transfer Destination (Call Forwarding) settings.

ul.li: Always: All the calls will be forwarded regardless of your state.
No Answer: Calls will be forwarded to if you don't answer the call.
When Busy: Calls will be forwarded when you are busy in a call.

substep.cmd: Select a destination for the selected forwarding condition.

step.cmd: If you are using Linkus client, set the Ring Strategy for your IP phone, Linkus mobile client, and Linkus PC client.
